package com.basic;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Code1 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter a digit");
		int s=sc.nextInt();
		int s1;
		int count=0;
		s1=s;
		while(s>0) {
			s=s/10;
			count++;
			
		}
		System.out.println(count);
		
		
	}

}
